title: Hugs for Daddy
description: Hannah's dad has an important job--he's in the military. When her dad has to go away, Hannah is very sad. She and her mom gather things to send to her dad. What Hannah misses most are her dad's bedtime hugs. How will she find a way to send some hugs to her dad?
meta: cymbals, instruments, military, salute, tracing, uniform
Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand and remember story events
Problem and Solution : Identify problem and solution
Vowel Digraphs : Identify long /e/ vowel digraphs
Quotation Marks : Identify and use quotation marks
Alphabetical Order : Arrange words in alphabetical order

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
